citations.narrative:
The front enclosure housing 2 emus consists of a dirt substrate ground. On the day of inspection the ground was
saturated from the prior night’s rain storm and the emus substrate consisted of mud and pools of muddy water in the two
adjacent corners of the enclosure closest to the board walk. A thin layer of dried mud was present up to their ankle joints
(e.g. similar to the area of the human knee). Fresh mud was caked on their feet as well as a third of the way up to their
ankle joints.
Housing facilities must be equipped with disposal and drainage systems that are constructed and operated so that animal
wastes and water, except for water located in pools or other aquatic areas (e.g., ponds, waterfalls, fountains, and other
water features), are rapidly eliminated so the animals have the option of remaining dry.
Correct by May 21, 2024 by ensuring enclosure yards offer the birds the opportunity to walk and rest on dry, non-muddy
substrate.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.150(g) 
   
Facilities, general. 
The front enclosure housing 2 emus consists of a dirt substrate ground. On the day of inspection the ground was 
saturated from the prior night’s rain storm and the emus substrate consisted of mud and pools of muddy water in the two 
adjacent corners of the enclosure closest to the board walk. A thin layer of dried mud was present up to their ankle joints 
(e.g. similar to the area of the human knee). Fresh mud was caked on their feet as well as a third of the way up to their 
ankle joints. 
 
Housing facilities must be equipped with disposal and drainage systems that are constructed and operated so that animal 
wastes and water, except for water located in pools or other aquatic areas (e.g., ponds, waterfalls, fountains, and other 
water features), are rapidly eliminated so the animals have the option of remaining dry. 
 
Correct by May 21, 2024 by ensuring enclosure yards offer the birds the opportunity to walk and rest on dry, non-muddy 
substrate. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
